com.oregonscientific.meep.msm
Interface ServerEventListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
ServerMessageHandler
public interface ServerEventListener

A MEEP event listener receivers notifications from a MEEP server. Notification indicates various state of the connection such as when the connection established, close, etc.

Author:
Stanley Lam

Method Summary
 void onClose()
          Notified when connection with the MEEP server is closed
 void onError(Throwable cause)
          Notified when there was an error
 void onOpen()
          Notified when a connection is established with a MEEP server
 void onReceive(String message)
          Notified when a message is received from the MEEP server
 void onSend(String data)
          Notifies when a message is sent to the MEEP server
